bill_title: Honoring and commending Cody Lutes, elementary school teacher, on being named Lennox School District Teacher of the Year.

bill_versions.bill_text: A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring and commending Cody Lutes, elementary school teacher, on being named Lennox School District Teacher of the Year. WHEREAS, Cody Lutes got his teaching degree from the University of Sioux Falls and completed his student teaching at Patrick Henry Middle School; and WHEREAS, after student teaching, Cody realized that he wanted to teach fifth graders and has worked diligently to ensure a fun-filled learning environment for his students for the past six years in Lennox; and WHEREAS, last year, Cody started teaching Project Lead the Way, in his science classes, which is hands-on curriculum that allows the students to learn science in various ways; and WHEREAS, Cody praises the incredible culture with his fellow teachers and for the support of the parents and the community: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature honors and congratulates Cody Lutes as the Lennox School District Teacher of the Year for the 2019-2020 school year.

A LEGISLATIVE COMMEMORATION, Honoring and commending Cody Lutes, elementary school teacher, on being named Lennox School District Teacher of the Year. WHEREAS, Cody Lutes got his teaching degree from the University of Sioux Falls and completed his student teaching at Patrick Henry Middle School; and WHEREAS, after student teaching, Cody realized that he wanted to teach fifth graders and has worked diligently to ensure a fun-filled learning environment for his students for the past six years in Lennox; and WHEREAS, last year, Cody started teaching Project Lead the Way, in his science classes, which is hands-on curriculum that allows the students to learn science in various ways; and WHEREAS, Cody praises the incredible culture with his fellow teachers and for the support of the parents and the community: NOW, THEREFORE, BE IT COMMEMORATED, by the Ninety-Fifth Legislature of the State of South Dakota, that the Legislature honors and congratulates Cody Lutes as the Lennox School District Teacher of the Year for the 2019-2020 school year.
